abstract: Roy Blount, president of the Authors Guild, said that the concerns about granting Google a monopoly over “orphan books” are overblown.
snippet: Roy Blount, president of the Authors Guild, said that the concerns about granting Google a monopoly over “orphan books” are overblown.
lead_paragraph: From our colleagues at the Media Decoder blog:

headline.main: Leader of Authors Guild Defends Google Book Settlement
